nodes.text: Mee Deechi's office was located in the Republic Executive Building. It was in this office that he was murdered by Lolo Purs.

After Onaconda Farr's funeral, Mee Deechi and Halle Burtoni were drinking when Padmé Amidala and Bail Organa asked them for information about Onaconda Farr's death. Later on, Amidala, Organa, and Lieutenant Tan Divo of the Coruscant Security Force returned to the office, where they found the body of Deechi, who had been stabbed to death.
